Home » 15A4 Catukkanipātapāḷi » 5 Pañcamapaṇṇāsaka » 5.7 Kammapathavagga
5.7.9 Byāpannacittasutta
Pañcamapaṇṇāsaka
Kammapathavagga
Byāpannacittasutta
272.
1592…pe…  Attanā ca byāpannacitto hoti, parañca byāpāde samādapeti, byāpāde ca samanuñño hoti, byāpādassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati—  imehi…pe… .
1593Attanā ca abyāpannacitto hoti, parañca abyāpāde samādapeti, abyāpāde ca samanuñño hoti, abyāpādassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati—  imehi…pe… .
1594Navamaṃ.
